document_data.name: Ermlaut
document_data.mainbody:
'''Ermlaut''' was an inhabitant of the [[Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|I guess there are other uses for magic besides fighting off invading cultists. But I wonder if these mages shouldn't be in the battle.|Ermlaut}}
document_data.Description: Ermlaut was a [[human]] man with a light skin tone, dark brown eyes, and curly blonde hair.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, as the [[Cult of the Absolute]] menaced the city of Baldur's Gate, Ermlaut attended a performance of some showy magics by three spellslingers, on the [[Murl's Rest]] plaza in front of [[Sorcerous Sundries]]. Ermlaut enjoyed the show but wondered whether these street mages would be better off on the battlefield, fighting [[the Absolute]].
